heading: HR02059
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN URGENT INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION-COMMISSION ON AUDIT-DEPARTMENT OF BUDGET AND MANAGEMENT JOINT CIRCULAR 1, SERIES OF 2017 WHICH INSTITUTIONALIZES AGENCY HIRING IN THE CIVIL SERVICE AND WILL CAUSE A MASSIVE LAYOFF OF JOB ORDER AND CONTRACT OF SERVICE WORKERS IN GOVERNMENT BY END OF 2018
principal-authors: TINIO, ANTONIO L.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.; CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-08-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02059
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN URGENT INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION INTO CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION-COMMISSION ON AUDIT-DEPARTMENT OF BUDGET AND MANAGEMENT JOINT CIRCULAR 1, SERIES OF 2017 WHICH INSTITUTIONALIZES AGENCY HIRING IN THE CIVIL SERVICE AND WILL CAUSE A MASSIVE LAYOFF OF JOB ORDER AND CONTRACT OF SERVICE WORKERS IN GOVERNMENT BY END OF 2018
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TINIO, ANTONIO L., CASTRO, FRANCE L., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., BROSAS, ARLENE D., DE JESUS, EMMI A., CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.
